name: .SCHEM
summary: Learn about .SCHEM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open and edit SCHEM files using a variety of Minecraft mod tools. WorldEdit and Litematica are two noteworthy mod tools that allow players to create, export, and import SCHEM files from within Minecraft Java Edition.
You can convert SCHEM files to SCHEMATIC files, for use in pre-1.13 versions of Minecraft, using SchemToSchematic (Web) or Mineways (Windows).
